bug.author: chenhuims
bug.description:
When running the hyperparameter exploring <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/ComputerVision/blob/master/classification/notebooks/11_exploring_hyperparameters.ipynb>notebook</denchmark-link> , I observe that there is a significant difference between my output below <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20047467/58045293-05e38200-7b10-11e9-98e5-81b0349cc58e.png></denchmark-link>
and the output in the notebook online. To increase the reproducibility of the results, it might be useful to fix the random seeds and other randomness in the model.
